tagline: Multilingual Developer | IT Enthusiast | Avid Reader and Traveler
about_description: Hello! I'm Henry, a multilingual developer currently living in Japan. I speak English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and basic Chinese. I am passionate about technology, self-growth, and exploring different cultures.
edu_chibamode: Chiba Mode Business College - International Business IT Course (2023–2025)
motivation_text: After attending your company’s information session and factory tour, I was deeply impressed by your innovative use of cutting-edge technology. I am particularly drawn to your vision for addressing societal challenges such as the declining birthrate and aging population. I aspire to contribute with my development skills and grow together with your company.
appeal_text: I am proactive, possess strong communication skills, and have a strong sense of responsibility. I can act calmly and swiftly even in complex situations, and have built smooth relationships within diverse teams. My strong sense of responsibility is rooted in Japanese culture, and I believe these qualities will allow me to make meaningful contributions to your company.
